abilities.name: Electromagnetic Power
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your Magnemites, Magnetons, or Dark Magnetons and attach it to a different 1 of your Magnemites, Magnetons, or Dark Magnetons. This power can't be used if Magneton is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, attach 1 of them to Magneton.
